attributes.action: Get the Southern Railways Network working
attributes.additional_details: The Government  pays huge sums in Franchise fees to the keep Railways running. The Government should not stand back with excuses not to get involved. Railways are a vital part of the UK economy and therefore a Government issue. Get back to work while GTR, RMT and Aslef jaw-jaw.
attributes.background: This dispute is not only severely affecting the fare paying public but also having a negative affect on the economy ot the region. People are having difficulty getting to work or having to give up
